success.quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed.
success.author: Azim Premji

success.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
success.author: Mahatma Gandhi

success.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

focus.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
focus.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

focus.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
focus.author: Alexander Graham Bell

focus.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
focus.author: Bruce Lee

growth.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
growth.author: Chinese Proverb

growth.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
growth.author: Napoleon Hill

growth.quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
growth.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

learning.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
learning.author: Albert Einstein

learning.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
learning.author: Mahatma Gandhi

learning.quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
learning.author: Malcolm X

motivation.quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
motivation.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

motivation.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs
